title: Vertical Drop
description: **This publishing of this book is on hold indefinitely.**It’s their last summer before college and best friends, Nola and Kelly, plan on spending their days by the pool reading, swimming, and soaking up the sun. Unfortunately, Nola’s hopes of enjoying a peaceful summer go up in smoke when her punk ass stepbrother, Parker, returns home from a two year stint in reform school. It isn’t until Kelly begins dating Parker, that Nola realizes her stepbrother isn’t the same asshole he used to be. He’s changed for the better, and now he’s damn near irresistible. How long can Nola hide her feelings when the one person she can’t have is the one she desires most?
author: L.J. Anderson
